channel.title: Comments on: Irish Web2.0 Applications… please submit

item.title: By: Project Syndicate » Blog Archive » Irish Web 2.0 company? Submit to the directory please
item.dc:creator: Project Syndicate » Blog Archive » Irish Web 2.0 company? Submit to the directory please
item.description: [...] Fergus is compiling a list of Irish Web 2.0 companies so please hop over to submit your business for the directory. [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] Fergus is compiling a list of Irish Web 2.0 companies so please hop over to submit your business for the directory. [...]

item.title: By: Rob O'Leary
item.dc:creator: Rob O'Leary
item.description:
Post282 lets visitors create private community websites for sharing pictures, posting messages, live chat, RSS aggregation, rich media posting, etc.
The system was designed, built, and is hosted in Dublin.
item.content:encoded:
Post282 lets visitors create private community websites for sharing pictures, posting messages, live chat, RSS aggregation, rich media posting, etc.

The system was designed, built, and is hosted in Dublin.

item.title: By: Brian O'Doherty
item.dc:creator: Brian O'Doherty
item.description: Online, web-based communications and collaborationn network. Your own network, very rich function, together with your business contacts, family, friends. Sort of similar to Groove + Sharepoint combined. Tailor it to your corporate or group needs, styles, data, databses, etc. Such as in Dermanet.co.uk. Soon to include Telecryption, which allows end to end encryption of data being communicated or stored on the network, without effort. Quiknets includes internal, spam free email, workspaces, chat, online weblinks, profiles, member search, bulletin board, RS feeds- configure your own-online document creation, storage online of files, folders, etc.
item.content:encoded: Online, web-based communications and collaborationn network. Your own network, very rich function, together with your business contacts, family, friends. Sort of similar to Groove + Sharepoint combined. Tailor it to your corporate or group needs, styles, data, databses, etc. Such as in Dermanet.co.uk. Soon to include Telecryption, which allows end to end encryption of data being communicated or stored on the network, without effort. Quiknets includes internal, spam free email, workspaces, chat, online weblinks, profiles, member search, bulletin board, RS feeds- configure your own-online document creation, storage online of files, folders, etc.

item.title: By: Administrator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description:
Good point Ben
however, the generic tag is "web2ireland" - as per event, etc.
Regards Fergus
item.content:encoded:
Good point Ben

however, the generic tag is “web2ireland” – as per event, etc.

Regards
Fergus

item.title: By: Benjamin Mosse
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Mosse
item.description: I have a suggestion. Tag your own site, once it's in production with the delicious tag <strong>irishweb2</strong>. If everyone does this we have an instant directory of Irish Web2.0 companies.
item.content:encoded: I have a suggestion. Tag your own site, once it’s in production with the delicious tag irishweb2. If everyone does this we have an instant directory of Irish Web2.0 companies.

item.title: By: jdrumgoole
item.dc:creator: jdrumgoole
item.description: Secantus is developing a product and services to allow home users to find, organise, secure and share their personal digital content (photos, videos, music, documents). The service will be lauching in private beta as <a href="http://putplace.com"/ rel="nofollow">PutPlace.com</a> in September.
item.content:encoded: Secantus is developing a product and services to allow home users to find, organise, secure and share their personal digital content (photos, videos, music, documents). The service will be lauching in private beta as PutPlace.com in September.

item.title: By: Derek Organ

item.content:encoded:
Web based time tracking software- 1time

Dublin, Ireland

We are currently in public beta and on hold for the moment while we negotiate funding.
